feature.label: RTSC/XDCtools (Target Runtime Support)
feature.description:
XDCtools Target Runtime Support for a Eclipse-based IDEs.

This version of XDCtools Target Runtime Support can be chosen separately for each C/C++ project via its project settings. The correspondingly versioned XDCtools IDE Client, on the other hand, is compatible with this and all earlier releases of the XDCtools Target Runtime Support feature.
feature.license: Released under the Eclipse Public License v1.0
